description: Firefighters return to the scene of the blaze to check for hotspots and continue looking into its cause.
title: Investigation launched into fire in Plymouth city centre
title_page: Investigation launched into fire in Plymouth city centre - BBC News
maintext:
Firefighters are investigating the cause of a blaze which engulfed a building near Plymouth city centre.
Crews from Devon and Somerset Fire Service were called to the derelict Nations Club property on Union Street at about 16:30 GMT on Saturday.
A fire service spokesperson said on Sunday that the blaze had affected the first and second floors of the building along with the roof space and crews had gone back to the scene to check for hotspots.
An investigation is now being carried out with a cordon erected around the building and its neighbouring properties including a KFC fast food restaurant.
